meanings.definition: To be shattered or broken into pieces
meanings.sent1: The delicate vase beshivered when it fell off the table.
meanings.sent2: The mirror beshivered into fragments when it hit the floor.
meanings.sent3: The cookie beshivered into crumbs as soon as I touched it.
meanings.sent4: The fragile ice sculpture beshivered under the weight of the sun's rays.
meanings.sent5: The old building beshivered as the wrecking ball struck its walls.

meanings.definition: To be covered in shivers or chills
meanings.sent1: She beshivered in the cold wind as she walked home.
meanings.sent2: The puppy beshivered after jumping into the icy pond.
meanings.sent3: The ghostly figure beshivered in the moonlight, sending shivers down my spine.
meanings.sent4: The eerie sound of the howling wind made the trees beshivered in fear.
meanings.sent5: The unexpected news beshivered her with a sudden chill of anxiety.
